resources.string: The host has disbanded the room. Please confirm your departure from the room.
Are you sure you want to disband this room?
Are you sure you want to leave this room?
Drag the slider below to complete the puzzle.

This demo is a testing product designed to showcase the usage and effectiveness of the product to Agora clients. It is intended solely for testing the functionality, performance, and usability of the product and is not intended for public use as a formal product.
1. We will assist you in understanding the collection, use, and storage of your personal information, as well as your related rights, based on the User Agreement and Privacy Policy.
2. When you use this testing software, we will collect your device information, log information, etc. Additionally, depending on the specific usage scenarios, you may grant us permissions to access your device's microphone, camera, and other information.

You can learn more by reading the complete User Agreement and Privacy Policy.
Services will be provided by this demo only after you agree to the User Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You have exceeded the 20-minute limit, and the current room has expired. Please exit and create a new room.
The current room has expired. Please exit.
Please grant microphone permission in the settings.
Please grant camera permission in the settings.
Please grant photo and video permissions in the settings.
Please grant necessary permissions in the settings.
The required permissions need to be granted.
